about.title: about-me
about.p1: I am a Systems Engineer with 4 years of experience in software development. I specialize in modern technologies such as Angular, React, Astro and Spring Boot, with solid knowledge in SQL databases.
about.p2: My focus is on implementing best development practices, writing clean and maintainable code. I rigorously apply design patterns and work efficiently with agile methodologies (Scrum) to ensure high-quality results.
about.p3: I excel in automated testing development and have experience deploying applications in the cloud. I constantly seek to improve code quality and efficiency, ensuring robust and scalable solutions for each project.
about.p4: I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Software Architecture at Universidad de La Sabana, as I firmly believe in the importance of continuous learning and professional evolution. This training allows me to stay at the forefront of best practices and trends in software development.
